member.name: IAppxManifestTargetDeviceFamily.GetMaxVersionTested
member.summary: Gets the maximum version tested from the AppxManifest.xml.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxManifestTargetDeviceFamily.GetMinVersion
member.summary: Gets the minimum version of the target device family from the AppxManifest.xml.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxManifestTargetDeviceFamily.GetName
member.summary: Gets the name of the target device family from the AppxManifest.xml..
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxManifestTargetDeviceFamily
member.summary: Retrieves information about the target device family from the AppxManifest.xml.
